original_text: Then four large animals came out of the sea. They were all different from each other.
korean_text: 큰 짐승 넷이 바다에서 나왔는데 그 모양이 각각 다르더라

sentences.original_text: Then four large animals came out of the sea.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 네 마리의 큰 짐승이 바다에서 나왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were all different from each other.
